data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Header Report'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}

define view entity ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_HEAD_RPR
  as select from    zetr_t_r101                as Head
    left outer join I_CompanyCode              as company           on Head.bukrs = company.CompanyCode

    left outer join I_CountryText              as extco             on  extco.Language = $session.system_language
                                                                    and extco.Country  = Head.extco
    left outer join I_CountryText              as desco             on  desco.Language = $session.system_language
                                                                    and desco.Country  = Head.desco
    left outer join zetr_t_exp101              as expty             on expty.expty = Head.expty

    left outer join I_CustomerPaymentTermsText as PaymentTermsText  on  PaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTerms = Head.pymty
                                                                    and PaymentTermsText.Language             = $session.system_language
  //    left outer join zetr_t_xexp107     as pymty   on  pymty.spras = $session.system_language
  //                                                  and pymty.pymty = Head.pymty
    left outer join zetr_t_xexp108             as trnty             on trnty.trnty = Head.trnty
    left outer join zetr_t_xexp112             as cuscd             on  cuscd.land1 = Head.extco //
                                                                    and cuscd.cuscd = Head.cuscd
                                                                    and cuscd.spras = $session.system_language
    left outer join I_JournalEntry             as accdoc            on accdoc.Reference1InDocumentHeader = Head.filen
    left outer join I_JournalEntryItem         as invno             on invno.AccountingDocument = accdoc.AccountingDocument
    left outer join I_Supplier                 as shpfr             on shpfr.Supplier = lpad(
      Head.shpfr, 10, '0'
    )
  //    left outer join I_BusinessPartner          as shpfr            on shpfr.BusinessPartner = Head.shpfr
  //    left outer join I_BusinessPartner          as brofr            on brofr.BusinessPartner = Head.brofr
    left outer join I_Supplier                 as brofr             on brofr.Supplier = lpad(
      Head.brofr, 10, '0'
    )
    left outer join I_Supplier                 as cusof             on cusof.Supplier = lpad(
      Head.cusof, 10, '0'
    )
    left outer join I_Customer                 as kunrg             on kunrg.Customer = Head.kunrg
    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_BANK        as BankOfCustomizing on BankOfCustomizing.iban = Head.iban

    left outer join I_Bank_2                   as bnka              on  bnka.BankCountry    = Head.bankcountry
                                                                    and bnka.BankInternalID = Head.bankid
    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_BRD_CRSS        as BorderCross       on  BorderCross.Snrkp = Head.snrkp
                                                                    and BorderCross.Langu = $session.system_language

    left outer join I_BusinessUserBasic        as _CreatedUser      on _CreatedUser.BusinessPartner = Head.ernam
    left outer join I_BusinessUserBasic        as _UpdatedUser      on _UpdatedUser.BusinessPartner = Head.aenam


{
  key Head.filen,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'expty_txt' ]
      Head.expty,
      expty.descr                                      as expty_txt,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'bukrs_txt' ]
      Head.bukrs,
      company.CompanyCodeName                          as bukrs_txt,
      Head.descr,
      Head.bldat,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'extco_txt' ]
      Head.extco,
      extco.CountryName                                as extco_txt,
      Head.extrg,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'desco_txt' ]
      Head.desco,
      desco.CountryName                                as desco_txt,
      Head.desrg,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'pymty_txt' ]
      Head.pymty,
      PaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTermsName        as pymty_txt,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'trnty_txt' ]
      Head.trnty,
      trnty.bezei                                      as trnty_txt,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'cuscd_txt' ]
      Head.cuscd,
      cuscd.bezei                                      as cuscd_txt,
      Head.cofrp,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'cusof_txt' ]
      Head.cusof,
      cusof.SupplierFullName                           as cusof_txt,
      Head.sfrrp,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'shpfr_txt' ]
      Head.shpfr,
      shpfr.SupplierFullName                           as shpfr_txt,
      Head.bfrrp,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'brofr_txt' ]
      Head.brofr,

      brofr.SupplierFullName                           as brofr_txt,
      Head.extfn,
      Head.rexdt,
      Head.cedno,
      Head.ceddt,
      Head.shpdt,
      Head.shpno,
      Head.extdt,
      Head.desdt,
      Head.nopck,
      Head.clsed,
      Head.fldel,
      Head.chind,
      bnka.BankInternalID                              as bankl,
      //      Head.bankl,
      //      Head.iban,
      BankOfCustomizing.iban,
      bnka.BankName,
      bnka.BankBranch,
      BankOfCustomizing.Swift                          as SWIFTCode,
      //@ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'kunrg_txt' ]
      Head.kunrg,
      cast(kunrg.CustomerFullName as abap.char( 80 ) ) as kunrg_txt,
      Head.inc01,
      Head.inc02,
      Head.lcnum,
      Head.plaka,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'SnrkpDescription' ]
      Head.snrkp,

      BorderCross.Description                          as SnrkpDescription,
      Head.ucsno,
      Head.ucstr,
      Head.hzrtr,
      Head.beyts,
      Head.beysa,
      Head.beyty,
      Head.hatbl,
      Head.gemia,
      Head.sefno,
      Head.sbeyt,
      Head.bolnumber,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'brgew_gewei'
      Head.brgew,
      Head.brgew_gewei,
      Head.ntgew_gewei,

      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'ntgew_gewei'
      Head.ntgew,
      Head.gewei,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'gewei'
      Head.volum,
      Head.voleh,
      Head.erdat,
      _CreatedUser.PersonFullName                      as CreatedName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CreatedName' ]
      Head.ernam,
      Head.erzet,
      Head.aedat,
      Head.aezet,
      _UpdatedUser.PersonFullName                      as UpdatedName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'UpdatedName' ]
      Head.aenam,
      Head.reffn,
      Head.incno,
      accdoc.AccountingDocument,
      invno.AssignmentReference
}
where
  Head.isdeleted is initial
